text: William Turner (born c. 1866) was a Scottish footballer who played as a forward. ==Career== Turner played club football for Pollokshields Athletic, and made two appearances for Scotland, scoring one goal. ==References== Category:1866 births Category:Year of birth uncertain Category:Scottish footballers Category:Scotland international footballers Category:Pollokshields Athletic F.C. players Category:Association football forwards Category:Place of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:Place of death missing
title: Willie Turner (footballer)
